title: The Great Reset Is Really Not Going Well (Ep 1822)
description:
In this episode, I address the exploding crisis in China and I ask a critical question about Pelosi’s Taiwan trip. Also, I show video and audio of people fighting back against the “great reset.” 

News Picks:


Beyoncé Caves to Woke Mob, Removes Word 'Spazz' After Accusations of 'Ableism.’

Emerging crime capitals of America: These cities have the highest murders per capita.


Houston Gun Buyback Didn't Go According to Democrats' Plans.


Nobel economists were dead wrong on inflation: Don’t expect an apology.

Biden Admin Now Redefining Meaning of "Low Gas Prices.”


Laughable democrat hypocrisy about tax hikes.


Nancy Pelosi is looking for a prosecutor? For what?
